## Setup

```{r setup}
# packages to load
library(tidyverse)
```

## League Basics

```{r}
# league members - not sorted
gm <- c("Alex", "Katz", "Brett", "Mikulich", "Chris", "Jack", "Jon", "Todd", "Ian", "Ashton", "Dave", "Nate")

# alphabetized gm list
gm <- sort(gm)

# show list
gm
```


```{r}
# list of years league has been active
year <- c(2012:2019)

# podium placement, by year
first <- c("Mik", "Nate", "Nate", "Chris", "Nate", "Nate", "Dave", "Dave")
second <- c("Jon", "Alex", "Ian", "Ross", "Jon", "Chris", "Jon", "Jon")
third <- c("Katz", "Katz", "Jack", "Dave", "Katz", "Katz", "Chris", "Ross")

# podium tibble
podium <- tibble(year, first, second, third)

# show work
podium
```
